016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.PushImageCmd;
019import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.AuthConfig;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.Credential;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.MavenProjectProperties;
022import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
024import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
025import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
026import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException;
027import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
028import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
029import org.testcontainers.utility.DockerImageName;
030import org.testcontainers.utility.RegistryAuthLocator;
031
032import javax.inject.Inject;
033import java.util.Set;
034
035/**
036 * <p>Implementation of the <code>deploy</code> lifecycle for pushing Docker images</p>
037 * <p><strong>WARNING</strong>: this goal is not intended to be executed directly. Instead, Execute the <code>deploy</code>
038 * phase specifying the packaging type, eg:</p>
039 *
040 * <pre>mvn deploy -Dpackaging=docker-native</pre>
041 *
042 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
043 * @since 1.1
044 */
045@Mojo(name = "docker-push")
046public class DockerPushMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
047
048    @Inject
049    public DockerPushMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
050                             ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, DockerService dockerService) {
051        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService);
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException, MojoFailureException {
056        Packaging packaging = Packaging.of(mavenProject.getPackaging());
057        if (packaging == Packaging.DOCKER || packaging == Packaging.DOCKER_NATIVE || packaging == Packaging.DOCKER_CRAC) {
058            Set<String> images = getTags();
059
060            // getTags() will automatically generate an image name if none is specified
061            // To maintain error compatibility, check that an image name has been
062            // manually specified.
063            if (jibConfigurationService.getToImage().isPresent()) {
064                for (String taggedImage : images) {
065                    getLog().info("Pushing image: " + taggedImage);
066                    try (PushImageCmd pushImageCmd = dockerService.pushImageCmd(taggedImage)) {
067                        AuthConfig defaultAuthConfig = new AuthConfig();
068                        if (jibConfigurationService.getCredentials().isPresent()) {
069                            Credential credential = jibConfigurationService.getCredentials().get();
070                            defaultAuthConfig
071                                    .withUsername(credential.getUsername())
072                                    .withPassword(credential.getPassword());
073                        }
074                        RegistryAuthLocator registryAuthLocator = RegistryAuthLocator.instance();
075                        DockerImageName dockerImageName = DockerImageName.parse(taggedImage);
076                        AuthConfig authConfig = registryAuthLocator.lookupAuthConfig(dockerImageName, defaultAuthConfig);
077
078                        pushImageCmd
079                                .withAuthConfig(authConfig)
080                                .start()
081                                .awaitCompletion();
082                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
083                        Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
084                    } catch (Exception e) {
085                        throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
086                    }
087                }
088            } else {
089                throw new MojoFailureException("The plugin " + MavenProjectProperties.PLUGIN_KEY + " is misconfigured. Missing <to> tag");
090            }
091        } else {
092            throw new MojoFailureException("The <packaging> must be set to either [" + Packaging.DOCKER.id() + "] or [" + Packaging.DOCKER_NATIVE.id() + "]");
093        }
094    }
095}
